features.featureTitle: Add a “Custom domain” setup view in the frontend that lets the user enter a domain name (e.g., example.com) and displays clear, step-by-step instructions for pointing that domain to the currently deployed Internet Computer app URL (canister URL), including showing the current canister URL and providing copy-to-clipboard for the URL and any DNS values shown.

Add repository documentation (README section or a new docs page referenced from the README) describing how to set up a custom domain for this Internet Computer-hosted frontend, including what DNS records the user must create and where they should expect the site to be reachable after propagation (while keeping the instructions provider-agnostic).
